mapper.select: SELECT #{MOIM_TYPE} || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYMM') || LPAD(NVL(MAX(CAST(SUBSTR(MOIM_IDXX,7,4) AS NUMBER)) + 1, 1), 4, '0') AS MOIM_IDXX FROM TM_MOIMXM WHERE SUBSTR(MOIM_IDXX,3,4) = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYMM') AND SUBSTR(MOIM_IDXX,1,2) = #{MOIM_TYPE}

SELECT /*moim.getMoimImg*/ MOIM_IMAG
FROM ( SELECT MOIM_IMAG , '000' AS FILE_SEQC FROM VW_MOIMXM WHERE MOIM_IDXX = #{MOIM_IDXX}
UNION
SELECT FILE_PATH AS MOIM_IMAG , FILE_SEQC AS FILE_SEQC FROM TM_FILEXM A LEFT JOIN VW_MOIMXM B ON A.FILE_IDXX = B.MOIM_IDXX WHERE FILE_IDXX = #{MOIM_IDXX} AND A.FILE_PATH <> B.MOIM_IMAG AND DELT_YSNO = 'N' ) A ORDER BY FILE_SEQC
mapper.update: UPDATE /*moim.setMoimrEnd*/ TM_MOIMXM SET ENDD_YSNO = 'Y' WHERE MOIM_IDXX = #{MOIM_IDXX}
